errors.error_description: Version compatibility error - specifying Python 2.7 when the badge shows Python 3.5 support
correction_candidates: Naomi requires Python 3.5+ and the following system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install portaudio19-dev python3-pyaudio sox libsox-fmt-mp3`.
Naomi requires Python 3.6 or higher and the following system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install portaudio19-dev python3-pyaudio sox libsox-fmt-mp3`.
Naomi requires Python 3.5 or newer and the following system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install portaudio19-dev python3-pyaudio sox libsox-fmt-mp3`.
Naomi requires Python 3.7+ and the following system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install portaudio19-dev python3-pyaudio sox libsox-fmt-mp3`.
errors.golden_answer: Naomi requires Python 3.5+ and the following system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install portaudio19-dev python3-pyaudio sox libsox-fmt-mp3`.
